alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Cass (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CASS AND SOUTHWESTERN BOWIE COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Boston, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... New Boston, Maud, Marietta, Bryans Mill, and Spring Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
